remarks: The set of polarities of a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lpolset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lpolset.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lpolset.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lpolset.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lpolset.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lpolset.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` W ) $.
lpolsetN $p |- ( W e. X -> P = { o e. ( S ^m ~P V ) | ( ( o ` V ) = { .0. } /\ A. x A. y ( ( x C_ V /\ y C_ V /\ x C_ y ) -> ( o ` y ) C_ ( o ` x ) ) /\ A. x e. A ( ( o ` x ) e. H /\ ( o ` ( o ` x ) ) = x ) ) } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d S o $.
$d V o $.
$d W o x y $.
